data.title: Hat Yai announced a danger zone as flooding looms
data.description: Mayor urges residents to move their belongings to higher ground and prepare to evacuate as canals come close to overflowing

data.title: Gourmet Winter Wondersquare Transforms Sukhumvit into Winter Wonderland
data.description: Lays out captivating décor and a delectable spread featuring over 200 dishes

data.title: Two killed as construction crane collapses on Rama II Road
data.description: Another fatal incident occurs at a construction site for the notoriously dangerous elevated highway on Rama II

data.title: Home on the range in Saraburi
data.description: Wannabe cowboys and cowgirls are invited to have fun and eat lots of great food to be tasted at this weekend’s Meat & Milk Festival

data.title: Sorn earns Thailand's first three Michelin stars, a historic milestone
data.description: Thailand’s culinary scene reaches new heights with its first Three Michelin Stars, revealed at the 2025 Michelin Guide Thailand ceremony. The event also marked the official release of the guide's latest edition and the unveiling of its full restaurant selection.

data.title: Destination attractions key reason Malaysians visit Thailand
data.description: A recent survey conducted by the Tourism, Arts and Culture Ministry has found that destination attractions significantly influence Malaysians' decisions to holiday in Thailand.

data.title: China's largest desert fully encircled with green belt
data.description: The Taklimakan Desert, known as the "Sea of Death," has been completely encircled with a sand-blocking green belt stretching 3,046 km, said local authority in Northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur autonomous region.

data.title: SAC rejects ICC statements, cites Myanmar's non-membership
data.description: The Information Team of the State Administration Council (SAC) stated that Myanmar does not recognise ICC statements, citing the country's non-membership in the International Criminal Court.

data.title: Thai official visits Naypyidaw for border talks as Wa face Thai pressure
data.description: As the Thai military pressured the Wa to dismantle their camps in the disputed area, an advisor to Thailand's Foreign Affairs Minister arrived in Naypyidaw to discuss border security and stability, according to sources.

data.title: Thai official visits Naypyidaw for border talks as Wa face Thai pressure
data.description: As the Thai military pressured the Wa to dismantle their camps in the disputed area, an advisor to Thailand's Foreign Affairs Minister arrived in Naypyidaw to discuss border security and stability, according to sources.

data.title: A disastrous reboot
data.description: It has been 25 years since the original Cruel Intentions hit theatres. The 1999 version was a massive success among teenagers, grossing US$76 million worldwide. It was also the film that catapulted British rock group The Verve to international fame with their iconic single Bitter Sweet Symphony featured on the soundtrack.

data.title: The man with the killer shorts
data.description: The strongest brands usually have a hero product they are instantly recognised for. Hermès has their Birkin bags, Burberry is known for their trench coats and Porsche

data.title: PTTOR adjusts biodiesel blend to B5 in response to govt policy
data.description: Top official says all PTT stations are ready for the change, adding that the new formula will be compatible with all diesel vehicles, regardless of year or model

data.title: Thai Princess presides over Silk Festival 2024
data.description: Her Royal Highness Princess Sirivannavari Nariratana Rajakanya presided over the opening ceremony of "Silk Festival 2024 Towards Sustainable Development" under the concept of Silk Success Sustainability, extending the wisdom of Thai fabric to elevate to the international level and developing sustainably. The event is organized by the Department of Community Development, Ministry of Interior on Thursday, November 28, 2024, at the Impact Exhibition and Convention Center, Hall 6-7, Muang Thong Thani, Pak Kret District, Nonthaburi Province.

data.title: AI and automation come with opportunities and risks, says IBM
data.description: Organisations should be ready for opportunities and risks from artificial intelligence (AI), automation and cloud in order to gain maximum benefits from them, executives from tech company IBM Thailand and its subsidiary Apptio, said recently.

data.title: Aquatic plant in high demand in Phayao because of economic value
data.description: Amid surge in demand, ‘Kai Pam’ offers a source of revenue to locals

data.title: Chula embraces AI future with ChulaGENIE, its own gen-AI platform
data.description: In partnership with Google Cloud, university aims to make advanced capabilities accessible to students and staff

data.title: Singapore PM posts images to mark his visit to Thailand
data.description: Singaporean Prime Minister Lawrence Wong posted an X message with images of Wat Arun, Thai students and Chiang Mai golden tigress Ava to mark his arrival in Thailand on Thursday.

data.title: Ex-PPRP spokesman in hospital after blood pressure drops in prison
data.description: Suspect arrested over money-laundering charges related to The iCon Group could not eat due to worries, says Corrections Department spokesperson

data.title: NACC urged to probe state officials’ role in Buri Ram land case
data.description: Thai Social Democratic Party petition questions failure to implement court orders

data.title: House panel calls for review of MOU44 before starting talks on OCA
data.description: The committee also urged the government to discuss the issue in Parliament as it was too large a matter to be decided upon by a few people

data.title: SKY Group achieves new high record with nine-month revenue surpassing 4.73 billion baht
data.description: SKY Group achieves new high record with nine–month revenue surpassing 4.73 billion baht, marking a 66% robust growth; confident in sustained business momentum as year–end approaches, showcases full biometric system to serve tourists during peak season
